turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Reliable Home Services, how can I help?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: I've got a burst pipe! There's water everywhere in my kitchen!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: I understand this is urgent. Let me get you to our emergency team right away.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: I can hear this is an emergency. First, if you can safely reach your main water shutoff valve, please turn it off now. Can you tell me your name and address?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: I'm Tom Brown, 23 High Street, Prahran. I've turned off the water but it's still dripping from the ceiling.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Okay Tom, you've done the right thing turning off the water. What's the best number to reach you on?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Got it. A team member will call you back within thirty minutes at 0455 666 777. For immediate emergencies, our emergency line is 1300-555-000. Is there anything else you need right now?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: No, just please send someone quickly.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Absolutely, Tom. Stay safe and we'll have someone out to you as soon as possible.
